description:
As an agent
  I want to be able to view the information I submitted to the Planning Inspectorate
  So that I can review the information at anytime
name: Your Appeal Details

elements.name: Add link to the ‘Your planning appeal’ page - agent

steps.name: an agent has submitted an appeal
the agent is on the ‘Your planning appeal’ page
the page will contain a link to ‘View your appeal details’

elements.name: An agent views the appeal details

steps.name: an agent is on the 'Your planning appeal' page
the agent selects the 'View your appeal details' link
the appeal details will be shown - agent, without files
the user sees the label for appellant name as "Appellant name"

elements.name: An agent decides to open all sections

steps.name: an agent is viewing a valid appeal with all sections closed

elements.name: Non JS - all sections will be open by default - agent

steps.name: an agent is viewing the appeal details with Javascript disabled
all the sections are opened

elements.name: File count for each document type - agent

steps.name: an agent has submitted an appeal that includes multiple documents
a count for each document type will be displayed on the page - agent

elements.name: ‘Back' link goes back to the previous page￼- agent

steps.name: an agent is viewing a valid appeal
the agent selects the ‘Back’ link
the "Your planning appeal" page will be displayed for the current appeal - agent
